original_text: Then Sarai said to Abram, ‘It is because of you that Hagar is now insulting me. I gave her to you so that you could have sex with her. Now she is pregnant and she does not respect me. The Lord will decide who is right, you or me.’
korean_text: 사래가 아브람에게 이르되 내가 받는 모욕은 당신이 받아야 옳도다 내가 나의 여종을 당신의 품에 두었거늘 그가 자기의 임신함을 알고 나를 멸시하니 당신과 나 사이에 여호와께서 판단하시기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: It is because of you that Hagar is now insulting me
sentences.korean_translation: 당신 때문에 하가가 지금 나를 모욕하고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: so that you could have sex with her
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 그녀와 성관계를 가질 수 있도록

sentences.original_text: and she does not respect me
